context: do you get 30 days for free ? when you buy this

context: I already own this game and played on windows 8, but I uninstalled it and then reinstalled it and it doesn't work. What do I do to continue playing?
response: You need to go into the origin account you created to play the game and make sure you install all updates before attempting to play or game will have issues.  You can access all your sim stuff on origin you may have to enter  license code but once it's there you can access it from anywhere.
